extracted_playbook.title: Identify Affected System and Version
extracted_playbook.description: Check if the system is affected by the CVE by retrieving the installed version of TheHive or Cortex.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the system affected by the CVE?
Is it possible to update to the latest version?

extracted_playbook.title: Update to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update TheHive or Cortex to the latest version to patch the vulnerability.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Active Directory Authentication Module
extracted_playbook.description: Disable the Active Directory authentication module to prevent the vulnerability exploitation if updating is not possible.
